tool_description: Estimates water flow rates and volume availability for streams and flowing water sources using simple field measurements and observations.

stream_width_meters.description: Width of water flow in meters (0.1 to 100)

average_depth_cm.description: Average water depth in centimeters (1 to 500)

flow_speed.description: Visual flow speed assessment: very_slow, slow, moderate, fast, very_fast

measurement_method.description: How measurements were taken: visual_estimate, stick_measurement, paced_measurement, float_timing

error_messages: Stream width out of range: Width must be between 0.1 and 100 meters.
Depth measurement invalid: Depth must be between 1 and 500 centimeters.
Invalid flow speed: Use one of [very_slow, slow, moderate, fast, very_fast].
Invalid measurement method: Use one of [visual_estimate, stick_measurement, paced_measurement, float_timing].
usage: Measure or estimate stream width and depth, assess flow speed visually, and specify measurement method used. Tool provides flow rate estimates and collection volume projections.

estimated_flow_rate_lpm.description: Estimated flow rate in liters per minute

daily_volume_estimate_liters.description: Estimated daily water volume passing this point

collection_feasibility.description: Assessment of how easily water can be collected: excellent, good, difficult, impractical

measurement_confidence.description: Reliability of estimates: high, medium, low

collection_rate_estimate.description: Expected collection rate with basic containers
